arts.ttl: Cole Palmer fires clear six-word Chelsea promise as Enzo Maresca tells him what he must do
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca is not concerned with Palmer's form in front of goal and believes it is completely normal what his star man is going through - pointing out that he is indeed a human being. In his debut season at Stamford Bridge, the England attacker - who is set to be a prominent figure under new Three Lions manager Thomas Tuchel - scored an astonishing 25 goals and produced 15 assists in all competitions.

arts.ttl: 'I will be': Cole Palmer makes promise to Chelsea fans as drought continues following Southampton blank

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Aston Villa rival Chelsea & Arsenal for €50million attacker transfer
arts.sum: Aston Villa are set to enter the market for a new striker in the summer, with Porto front-man Samu Aghehowa emerging as a transfer target to replace Jhon Duran. arts.ttl: “We’ll see” – Maresca not inspiring confidence that Chelsea can keep hold of star man
arts.sum: Chelsea’s season is in danger of falling below expectations yet again, and Enzo Maresca hasn’t inspired confidence that the Blues will be able to keep hold of one player in particular. arts.ttl: Cole Palmer breaks silence on recent slump in form - as he sends message to Chelsea fans after Southampton thrashing
arts.sum: Palmer has failed to score or assist across his past seven games in all competitions, with the 21-year-old undergoing what seems to be his first dip for the club.

arts.ttl: Chelsea back to winning ways as Southampton’s sorry season continues
arts.sum: Christopher Nkunku, Pedro Neto, Levi Colwill and Marc Cucurella scored in a 4-0 victory.

arts.ttl: Aaron Ramsdale's secret transfer clause puts Premier League clubs on red alert
arts.sum: England goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale completed a big-money switch to Southampton last summer but it appears that the former Arsenal star could potentially be on the move again soon

arts.ttl: CONFIRMED: Chelsea consider summer move for Aaron Ramsdale
arts.sum: Chelsea are considering a summer move for Southampton goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale, FootballTransfers has been told. However, FootballTransfers understands that Chelsea have internally discussed the possibility of rekindling their interest in Ramsdale ahead of the 2025 summer transfer window as they look to sign a new goalkeeper.
